title: Rito Pls
body:
Riot please fix your site. For the past week my game has had SERIOUS lag at the worst of times, and i've NEVER had lag before. I've checked, it's not on my end. I thought it might be until today, when I say your update about players having login issues. I was in the middle of the comeback game of my life, a 4v5 with no jungler where we were just starting to come back, taking down turrets and even acing the enemy team, when all of a sudden the game decided to disconnect me and my two party members at around the same time, swiftly ending the game And as it is I cannot log back in at all, the Sign In bar is just grey. 

I'm kinda salty right now because of this, the last game I had where it was a 2v1 on top with me against a Lux and Garen (Which, why? And why didn't my jungler lane with me??), and because Riven and Yas have the legendary skins and not Talon, or Vel'Koz, or Zyra. So I know that you're all probably working as fast as you can but I just really want to play my favorite game to hopefully make up for the crap storms of the last two games.

replies.body:
Oh snap that's some pretty bad timing. I really wish I could get you back in that game, if not just to hear that comeback tale!

We know a good number of players are being affected by that weird sign-in issue, and we want to help where we can. It'd be best to look into what happened on a case by case basis, so go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get the ball rolling!
